alert.note: Alert for Keith; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 8:41PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Perkins and southwestern Keith Counties through 830 PM MDT... At 740 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Brule, or near Big Springs, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ogallala, Brule, Roscoe, Megeath and Lake View Campground. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 80 and 93. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 110 and 134. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
